posts.name: Adam Benhrima
posts.heading: Match report v Putney St Germain
posts.body: Claremont Gorillas 17s returned to action against Putney St Germain on Saturday. It was over two years since our last victory against them, and always a fiercely contested match. We were also able to show off our fantastic new kit, kindly sponsored by The Albany - Great Portland Street

posts.name: Oliver Smith
posts.heading: CUP FINAL TONIGHT!
posts.body: 7:30PM Kick off in this evenings Wimbledon and District Cup Final - Claremont Gorillas 17 V South Wimbledon Dazzlers - Whyteleafe Football Club.
